department.dept_long_name: Department of Chemistry and Chemical Biology

course.title: Experimental Inorganic Chemistry
course.meeting_text: One 90 minute lecture per week Tuesdays 6 - 7:30 pm; Labs Tuesday & Thursday 1 - 6 pm
course.faculty_text: Theodore A. Betley and Austin Bennett Scharf
course.description: An introduction to experimental problems encountered in the synthesis, isolation, purification, characterization, and identification of inorganic compounds, with an emphasis in air-free synthetic techniques and spectroscopic characterization methods specifically applicable to complexes containing transition metals.
course.prerequisites: Chemistry 40 and either Chemistry 27 or 30, or permission of the instructor.
